title: LF ADC or JG to Duo with High Silver/Gold
body:
Sup main looking for an ADC or JG to duo with.

Finished Season 6 Gold 4 in NA, currently Silver 3 and looking to improve.

Very chill player so if you are toxic please don't hit me up.

Add me Bardarella and we will jump in a game.

Pref 21+
